articles.title: Greetings to Mongolian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, president of Mongolia, on July 8 on the 95th anniversary of the victory of the Mongolian people's revolution.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the president and the friendly people of Mongolia great success in their work for the development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Mongolian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Mongolian PM
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Jargaltuul Erdenebat upon his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Mongolia on Saturday.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the development of the country and the people's wellbeing, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger in various fields in the common interests.
					
					 That day Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to the Mongolian prime minister on the 95th anniversary of the victory of the Mongolian people's revolution.

articles.title: Greetings to Mongolian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Mongolian FM
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of greeting to his Mongolian counterpart Lundeg Purevsuren on July 8 on the 95th anniversary of the victory of the Mongolian people's revolution.
					 In the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Mongolian foreign minister success in his work.

articles.title: CPRC Spokesman Slams Park Geun Hye's Remarks on "Possible Terrorism of North"
articles.content:
CPRC Spokesman Slams Park Geun Hye's Remarks on "Possible Terrorism of North"
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK Sunday gave an answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the Park Geun Hye group is vociferating about the "possible terrorism of the north" in a bid to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					 Park blustered at a "state council meeting" in Chongwadae on July 4 that "nowhere is safe from terrorism", "the north is attempting to perpetrate various forms of terrorism in an effort to cause conflict in the south Korean society" and "it is necessary to cope with the situation from the viewpoint that the north's terrorist act is imminent."
					
					 Earlier, the puppet prime minister of south Korea at the first meeting of the "State Measure Committee to Prevent Terrorism" raved that "there is concern that the north may abduct south Koreans abroad or use an international terrorist organization for committing terrorism" and "such sign had already been detected long ago."
					
					 The spokesman said that the fiction about "the north's terrorism" floated by the south Korean puppet regime is another grave politically-motivated provocation and a heinous action to ratchet up the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The "possible terrorism of the north" much touted by the puppet regime while talking about "relations with an international terrorist organization" is nothing but sheer sophism intended to divert the public criticism of it  to the DPRK.
					
					 The Park regime is the kingpin of terrorism and a group of unethical crimes hell-bent on faking up heinous terrorist organizations such as the "association for bringing down statues" and on infiltrating spies and saboteurs into the DPRK in a bid to insult its dignity and bring down its social system.
					
					 No matter how vociferously the puppet regime may trumpet about the "possible terrorism of the north", no one will be taken in by such poor plot and ridiculous rigmarole and with nothing can it conceal its despicable true colors as terrorists and abductors hell-bent on the operations to do harm to the fellow countrymen and fascist suppression.
					
					 The puppet regime should clearly understand that its base burlesque to bring the charge of "terrorism" to the DPRK would only invite a stern judgment by all Koreans.

articles.title: Preparatory Committees for Joint Conference for Peace and Independent Reunification of Korean Peninsula Formed
articles.content:
Preparatory Committees for Joint Conference for Peace and Independent Reunification of Korean Peninsula Formed
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The north side preparatory committee for the joint conference of the political parties, organizations and individuals from the north and the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula issued a press release on Sunday.
					 According to the press release, the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint conference of the political parties, organizations and individuals from the north and the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula was formed in Shenyang, China on July 6.
					
					 The regional preparatory committee of the Commonwealth of Independent States was also inaugurated in Moscow on the same day.
					
					 Besides, the work for forming preparatory committees is being conducted briskly in different areas of the world, instilling great conviction and optimism into all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad hoping for a successful holding of the great national conference.

articles.title: Meari Sounder Company
articles.content:
Meari Sounder Company
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Meari Sounder Company in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, is a sound facility producer as well as a sound technology research center. 
					 The company, founded on July 10 Juche 80 (1991), has recently turned out new types of high-power loudspeakers, six kinds of stand-up microphones and microphone karaoke machines.
					
					 High-power loudspeakers are widely used at theatres, cultural houses and open-air stages.
					
					 Stand-up microphone is a high-efficiency sound apparatus, smaller in size than the existing ones.
					
					 Karaoke device, easy to handle, is now enjoying popularity among users as it contains at least 2,000 pieces of songs accompanied with animation files, including those created by the Moranbong and Chongbong bands.
					
					 According to Kim Il Ryong, manager of the company, its products won gold and silver prizes at several rounds of international exhibitions of inventions and new technologies held in Geneva, Switzerland.
					
					 The company will develop more quality sound facilities, he said.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Grip Hearts of World People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Grip Hearts of World People
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, has captured the minds of world people as it shows the history of his lifelong revolutionary struggle as well as his noble traits as a peerlessly great person.
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania said at a seminar on the reminiscences that Kim Il Sung, born into a patriotic and revolutionary family, is the great leader as he founded the Juche idea and steered the Korean revolution to victory after embarking on the road of revolution in his teens.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria, said at a reading session that the reminiscences of Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people, are an encyclopedia showing the precious truth of struggle for human independence.
					
					 A personage of Russia described the President's reminiscences as the review of the history of politics in the 20th century, stating that nobody is greater than him and nothing is more brilliant and glorious than his lifetime.
					
					 Media of different countries reported that Kim Il Sung's reminiscences are a must book everyone should read irrespective of differences in political view and religious faith.
					
					 "With the Century" had been disseminated in more than 170 countries and translated into nearly 20 national languages in tens of countries till Juche 101 (2012) after its first release in Juche 81 (1992).
					
					 The zeal for reading the reminiscences is now growing more intense among the world progressives.

articles.title: Newspapers Blast Park Geun Hye's Confrontational Remarks
articles.content:
Newspapers Blast Park Geun Hye's Confrontational Remarks
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers on Sunday carry commentaries blasting south Korean chief executive Park Geun Hye for spouting a flurry of provocative remarks against the DPRK.
					 Park at a "state council meeting" in Chongwadae on July 4 blustered that the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is bound to fail, crying out for boosting the "cooperation with the international community" to force the "north to dismantle its nukes and effect changes" and "maintaining a perfect posture to react to the north."
					
					 In addition, Park at a luncheon with riff-raffs of the "General Federation for Freedom" termed the DPRK's self-defensive deterrence a "threat" and made such disgusting remarks that her regime "has made efforts for peace" and "it is deplorable that the July 4 joint statement has not been properly implemented." 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun observes in this regard: What Park uttered is nothing but a desperate effort of the poor old woman to save the "cooperation in pressurizing the north" from bankruptcy as she is seized with such noctambulism of confrontation that she failed to notice the radical change in the DPRK's strategic position and the trend of the times.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing under the banner of the Juche-oriented line of simultaneously developing the two fronts despite the vicious obstructions of the hostile forces. It has emerged a nuclear power in the East.
					
					 However, traitor Park is still frantically kicking up the anti-DPRK nuclear racket backed by outside forces, reeling off a spate of sheer sophism in utter disregard of this hard reality.
					
					 She is working hard to bear the brunt of the campaign to prevent the anti-DPRK "sanctions" from going bust but in vain.
					
					 Her reckless remarks are a revelation of a cynic ploy to conceal the anti-reunification crimes the south Korean puppet group perpetrated by violating the precious agreements common to the nation, escape the domestic and foreign criticism of their confrontational moves and pass the buck for the catastrophic inter-Korean relations to the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson warns that the accusation made by Park against the DPRK with frowning face would precipitate her doom.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Support DPRK's Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Support DPRK's Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Federation of south Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification released a statement on July 7 in support of the DPRK's proposal for holding a great national conference for reunification.
					 The requirement of the times and the nation are reflected in the proposal made by the north as it calls upon the political parties, organizations and individuals from the north and the south and abroad to meet at one place before and after August 15 this year to hold a joint conference and have a candid discussion on the peaceful reunification of the country in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, the statement noted.
					
					 Reflected in the proposal of the north is the urgency and validity of national reunification any member of the nation cannot deny, it said.
					
					 It noted that the federation would fully support the north's proposal and work hard to hold the joint conference.

articles.title: Koreans in Germany Favor DPRK's Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Germany Favor DPRK's Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a statement on July 1 to support the proposal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations on holding a great national conference for reunification on the upcoming 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The great national conference for reunification proposed by the north side on June 9 is the most appropriate step for practical actions to implement the June 15 joint declaration, the statement said.
					
					 It positively supported the great national conference for reunification, convinced that it is the best way of saving the north-south relations from catastrophe and promoting the peace and reunification of the nation.
					
					 It said that the society would strive to successfully hold the historic great national conference.

articles.title: European Regional Committee Hails DPRK's Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
European Regional Committee Hails DPRK's Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement on June 30 in support of the DPRK's proposal for holding a great national conference for reunification.
					 The statement positively supported the proposal, saying it is the very proper way of defusing the confrontation and taking the way of reunification at the present when the relations between the north and the south are completely frozen.
					
					 It said that the European Regional Committee would make every possible effort to successfully hold the great national conference for reunification.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced by Romanian Organization
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced by Romanian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the Romanian Workers' Association on the website Romania Muncitoare on July 5 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Seminar on Exploits of Kim Il Sung Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminar on Exploits of Kim Il Sung Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars in Pakistan, Uganda and South Africa observed the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung from July 1 to 3.
					 On display at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were books and photos introducing Juche Korea.
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi branch of the Pakistan-DPRK Friendship Association said in a report that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, liberated the country and built socialism centered on popular masses, adding that his revolutionary idea is shedding its rays as the eternal guidelines of the cause of human independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and other speakers said Kim Il Sung will always be remembered by the world progressives.
					
					 A regional chief of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party praised Kim Il Sung for founding the Juche idea and opening up the era of independence in which the popular masses became the masters of history and their destiny, adding that he is always alive along with the 20th century when an unprecedentedly decisive turn was made in carving out the destiny of humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included round-table talks in Myanmar, lecture and film show in Hungary and film shows in Romania and Angola from June 27 to July 4.
					
					 "Always in Minds of Mankind" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that Kim Il Sung was an outstanding leader who defeated the Japanese imperialists, accomplished the cause of national liberation, beat back the U.S. imperialists' invasion and built Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea. The secretary noted:
					
					 He made immortal contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The distinguished exploits performed by him for the development of the DPRK and its people's happiness and global peace and stability will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by the world progressive people.
					
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, lauded Kim Il Sung for defeating U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation and provided the firm political, military and economic foundations for the DPRK to steadily make a long drive.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, and others lauded Kim Il Sung for ushering in a fresh era of history, era of independence, and taking all people to his arms with boundless humanity.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Personages of Guinea, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Personages of Guinea, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Personages of Guinea and Bangladesh issued statements on July 3 and 5 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that the Korean people and the world progressives were looking back with deep emotion on the life of Kim Il Sung who performed immortal exploits before the history and humankind with his outstanding ideology and theory and gigantic revolutionary practice.
					
					 He built the socialist state centred on the masses in the DPRK and made great contributions to the cause of national reunification and the cause of global independence with his outstanding leadership, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					 He is a tender-hearted father of the people who shared destiny with them, finding himself among them all his life, the most outstanding leader who represented the 20th century and a peerlessly great sage.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and cause are being carried forward century after century.
					
					 We followers of the Juche idea will make a positive contribution to the cause of global independence by conducting brisk activities for studying and disseminating great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the future, too.
					
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, praised Kim Il Sung for performing immortal exploits by providing a genuine guiding idea in the era of independence, defeating U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation and building a true socialist system under which the people became masters.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of mankind as he dedicated himself to the reunification of the country and the socialist construction and the victorious advance of the cause of human independence, he stressed.

articles.title: Many Personages Visit Kimilsungia Greenhouses in Indonesia and Guinea
articles.content:
Many Personages Visit Kimilsungia Greenhouses in Indonesia and Guinea
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia greenhouses were visited by many personages in Indonesia and Guinea with due ceremonies from July 1 to 8 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the greenhouses were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their works, and books and photos introducing Kimilsungias in full bloom and Juche Korea were on display.
					
					 A senior engineer of the greenhouse in Jakarta, Indonesia said that watching Kimilsungias, flower of the sun, visitors more keenly realize what a great man Kim Il Sung was, adding that he would make positive efforts to make Kimilsungias bloom in Indonesia more beautifully.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association lauded Kim Il Sung as the great thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea and tender-hearted father of all people.

articles.title: Serbian Figure Praises Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Serbian Figure Praises Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party in Serbia, made public a statement on July 4 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The ever-victorious DPRK would be unthinkable without Kim Il Sung, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It was one of the greatest exploits performed by the President that he founded the men-centred Juche idea and built a socialist country centred on the masses in the DPRK by successfully applying the idea to it.
					
					 We pay highest tribute to him, once again looking back on his career and undying exploits on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 His undying exploits performed for the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of global independence will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by progressive humankind.

articles.title: Myanmar Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Men of Mt. Paektu Inaugurated
articles.content:
Myanmar Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Men of Mt. Paektu Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar preparatory committee for the Meeting for Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed at the Myanmar Medical Research Institute on July 5.
					 Its inaugural ceremony discussed the matter of celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, as jubilees common to the world progressives and published a press release on it.
					
					 The preparatory committee with Tin Tun, chief of the institute, as its chairman will organize colorful celebrations, give wide publicity to the shining exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and positively support the Korean people in their just struggle for building a socialist power and achieving the national reunification on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star in 2017, the press release said.

articles.title: African Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
African Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- An African regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia on July 6.
					 Lawmaker of Ethiopia Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, director of the Youth and Sports Department of the Addis Ababa City Administration and chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events for highly praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between African countries and the DPRK to glorify significant 2017 as the auspicious year common to humankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Post of DPRK Hailed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Post of DPRK Hailed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting and book and photo exhibition in Mexico and meeting, seminar and lecture in Benin and Nigeria from July 3 to 5 to hail supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK all out in the general offensive for the final victory were also on show.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico expressed belief that the DPRK would firmly defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and further demonstrate its might as an invincible power emerging victorious under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Un for developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and ushering in the greatest heyday of the great Paektusan nation with his outstanding idea and experienced leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other speakers praised Kim Jong Un for training the Korean People's Army to be the vanguard ranks of the Songun revolution that achieved a firm unity with revolutionary moral sense of obligation and turning the DPRK into a full-fledged nuclear power.

articles.title: British Body Sees Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula as Prerequisite for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
British Body Sees Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula as Prerequisite for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article titled "Ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula is a prerequisite for reunification of Korea" on its website on June 29.
					 The article quoted Kim Jong Un as saying at the podium of the historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea that ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula is an issue vital to the destiny of the Korean nation and an essential prerequisite for the country's reunification. 
					
					 Improvement of the inter-Korean relations and independent and peaceful reunification of Korea are impossible under the present situation on the peninsula in which tension and danger of a nuclear war prevail, the article noted.
					
					 The independent and peaceful reunification of Korea can be achieved only when the military stand-off and danger of war are defused and peace and security are ensured on the peninsula, the article asserted, adding:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean rulers have challenged the DPRK's efforts for peace, seriously harassing the peace and security on the peninsula with their reckless war moves against the DPRK for the past decades.
					
					 The successive ruling quarters in south Korea have resorted to the ceaseless war moves against the DPRK to realize their wild ambition for "unification of social systems" in concert with the outsiders.
					
					 Especially, the present south Korean ruling quarters malign the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, a treasured sword for ensuring peace on the peninsula and protecting the Korean nation, while ramping up their moves to ignite a new war in conspiracy with the U.S. under the pretext of coping with it.
					
					 The world progressives should turn out as one in the anti-war peace struggle to prevent the U.S. and south Korean authorities from staging provocative joint military drills against the DPRK and building up arms.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Ridicule U.S. Accusation against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Ridicule U.S. Accusation against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 5 in denunciation of the U.S. accusation against the DPRK over the issue of flesh traffic.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. stoops to any infamy to slander the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. made public the Trafficking in Persons Report in 2016 it cooked up with fabrications on June 30, in which it again sharply accused the dignified DPRK.
					
					 It is ridiculous that the U.S., kingpin of human rights abuses and the biggest human trafficker, pointed an accusing finger at the DPRK over the non-existent issue.
					
					 This is nothing but part of a series of the U.S. deceptive racket.
					
					 It is a vivid manifestation of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK that the former picked up the non-existent issue of flesh traffic of the latter.
					
					 The DPRK will hold fast to the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy.
					
					 We strongly denounce the U.S. vicious moves and fully support the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in this regard.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on July 5 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates tasks for firmly preserving and eternally glorifying their idea and exploits.
